Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Rather coarsely manufactured vase, that is deep and narrow, with a rounded base, restricted mouth and simple lip. The wall of the body is uneven and slightly dented. The interior surface is light brown and has been polished. The exterior surface bears traces of a dark red slip and has been vigorously burnished vertically.
